task.name: importmiriad
task.shortdescription: Convert a Miriad visibility file into a CASA MeasurementSet
task.description: Convert a Miriad visibility file into a CASA MeasurementSet with optional selection of spectral windows and weighting scheme

param.name: mirfile
param.shortdescription: Name of input Miriad visibility file
param.description:
Name of input Miriad visibility file Default: none
Example: mirfile='mydata.uv'

param.name: vis
param.description:
Name of output MeasurementSet Default: none
Example: vis='mydata.ms'

param.name: tsys
param.shortdescription: Use the Tsys to set the visibility weights
param.description: Use the Tsys to set the visibility weights Default: False Options: False|True

param.name: spw
param.description:
Select spectral window/channels Default: '' (all spectral windows and channels)
Examples: spw='0~2,4'; spectral windows 0,1,2,4 (all channels) spw='<2'; spectral windows less than 2 (i.e. 0,1) spw='0:5~61'; spw 0, channels 5 to 61 spw='0,10,3:3~45'; spw 0,10 all channels, spw 3 - chans 3 to 45. spw='0~2:2~6'; spw 0,1,2 with channels 2 through 6 in each. spw = '*:3~64' channels 3 through 64 for all sp id's spw = ' :3~64' will NOT work.

param.name: vel
param.description:
Select velocity reference Default: telescope dependent, ATCA -> TOPO, CARMA -> LSRK Options: TOPO|LSRK|LSRD
Example: vel='LSRK'

param.name: linecal
param.description:
(CARMA) Apply line calibration Default: False Options: False|True
Only useful for CARMA data

param.name: wide
param.description:
(CARMA) Select wide window averages
Select which of the wide-band channels should be loaded Only useful for CARMA data

param.name: debug
param.description:
Display increasingly verbose debug messages Default: 0
Example: debug=1

task.example: FOR MORE INFORMATION, SEE THE TASK PAGES OF IMPORTMIRIAD IN CASA DOCS: https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
